channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Engineering Lifecycle Optimization
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Engineering Lifecycle Optimization

item.title: CVE-2020-4865|2024-09-16T20:21:28.445Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 190741.

item.title: CVE-2021-20506|2024-09-16T19:25:24.647Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation Products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 198231.

item.title: CVE-2021-29786|2024-09-16T19:31:21.815Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server products stores user credentials in clear text which can be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 203172.

item.title: CVE-2020-4487|2024-09-16T18:50:20.695Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation Products could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 181862.
